name: Lovely Cat: Dessert Bakery
storyline: Do you want to have your own dessert shop? Do you want to serve beautiful and delicious desserts to the endless stream of customers? Come to the Lovely Cat: Dessert Bakery and make desserts for cat customers!
summary: Easy to understand, fun and challenging! illustrated collection, come and fill up the illustrated book! Various styles of decoration, come and try it! Call your best friends, come to the Lovely Cat: Dessert Bakery together, make beautiful and delicious desserts, and become a top pastry chef!
